title: Almost abelian numbers
authors: Iulia C\u{a}t\u{a}lina Ple\c{s}ca and Marius T\u{a}rn\u{a}uceanu
abstract:
In this article we introduce the concept of almost $\mathcal{P}$-numbers. We
survey the existing results in literature for almost cyclic numbers and give
characterizations for almost abelian and almost nilpotent numbers proving these
two are equivalent.
